site_title: Dumpling Website Preview v9 — Refined Colors

hero.title: Dumpling
hero.subtitle: A bilingual Web3 YouTuber and cultural strategist — transforming complex blockchain ideas into accessible, story-driven education across YouTube and Twitter.

about.title: ABOUT
about.content: Dumpling is a bilingual Web3 educator, YouTuber, and strategist trusted by both English- and Chinese-speaking audiences. She creates deep, educational content that connects blockchain's human and cultural layers — bridging storytelling and social insight.

achievements.text: Supported 10+ Web3 teams on brand, community, and trust.
Helped teams 2.4x their X engagement and 3x followers organically.
Guided 60+ founders in their Web3 journey.

items.description: Guest talk on Careers in Web3.
Workshops on Web3 Security and Protection.

items.title: Social Media Rewired – How decentralized platforms reshape identity.
Trust Without Ads – Why credibility is the new marketing.
Branding in Web3 – Building loyalty through shared narratives.
The Culture Layer – Why belief and memes drive blockchain adoption.

items.quote: In a trustless ecosystem, credibility becomes a form of capital.
Education in Web3 is no longer top-down — it's peer-to-peer.
Blockchain's rise is not just technological; it's a cultural inflection point.
